item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: Danger summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.

item.title: Simon Rolph - CV
item.description: Education 2016 - Present, University of Sheffield, PhD Student PhD student at the University of Sheffield, Department of Animal and Plant science. Primary supervisor: Dr Dylan Childs, with supporting supervisors; Dr Rob Salguero-GÃ³mez, Dr Jonathan Potts and Proffessor Rob Freckleton. President of the Animal and Plant Sciences Department PostGrad Soceity (June 2017-current) 2013-2016, University of Exeter BSc (Hons) in Conservation Biology and Ecology at University of Exeter (Penryn Campus) 1st Class.
